attributes.title: clinical cosmetology
attributes.shortDescription:
• Complete Hands-On
  • All Procedures (Basic to Advance)
  • Lifetime Business Mentorship
  • Lifetime Trainer Mentorship
  • Complete Practice Set-Up
  • Patient Acquisition Strategies
  • Study Material
  • Product & Dealer Guide 
  • International Placement Assistance
attributes.courseAbout:
An International Education UK Board Certified, 3-month comprehensive fellowship program conceptualized for aestheticians & doctors to build an 8-figure practice and be recognized as an expert in the field of clinical cosmetology. Our fellows are amongst the most successful cosmetology practitioners in the country and abroad. 

 

The fellowship is tailor-fit with the prime objective of achieving a successful practice. It is designed keeping in mind the business, professional and practical approach toward cosmetology giving you have the ultimate edge over any competition, present or future. The exhaustive Hands-on format, a large variety of patients, multiple mentoring sessions, strategic business development, and patient acquisition and retention strategies empower the fellows to have a stellar cosmetology practice. Module 1 & 2 begins with us giving you the building blocks to immediately start your cosmetology practice. 

 

You will be trained on real-time patients and learn to formulate your own treatment plans and perform hands-on for all procedures on those patients. During the program, you will find an extensive display of innovative products & equipment of all the major brands complete with product guides and dealer guides that are up-to-date with market trends, economically viable, and safe for the patients. With the ever-updated list of cosmetology procedures, you will be trained with the latest advances in cosmetology with the best and most renowned names in the industry. 

 

Module 3 will be completely dedicated to getting one-on-one business mentoring & patient acquisition sessions in all aspects of the practice. This will help you in understanding your roads blocks and stabilizing your practice. Being a fellow gives you an added privilege to join us again for Module 4. Here you will perform Hands-on training for your identified areas of weakness. With this complete program, we ensure that your practice is a roaring success. And we secure your journey with our lifetime mentor-ship and support.

roadmap.name: Online Activities
roadmap.description:
• 6 days- 6 online activities before the Hands-On Module Starts. 
  • 1 Online Live Interactive Lecture Session (webinar) 
  • Lectures Series Part 1 (8 Prerecorded Lectures), covers various aspects of Clinical Cosmetology, to help you understand the intricacies before coming for Hands-On modules.

roadmap.name: In-Person Activities
roadmap.description:
• 6 days of In-Person Hands-On Training Session 
  • Product Tour - Devices Tour - Business Training - Patient Acquisition & Management

roadmap.name: Practice Establishment
roadmap.description:
• Lectures Series Part 2 (6 Pre-Recorded Lectures), covers various aspects of Clinical Cosmetology, to help strengthen your learning and knowledge and for your assistance in the later stages of your practice. 
  • Online Live Open Discussion Sessions: 3 Sessions: These are meant to Hands-hold you further to establish you in your practice. Doubt clearing, business planning, road mapping, case discussions, and understanding roadblocks and areas of weakness are prime pointers.

roadmap.name: Achieving  Finesse
roadmap.description: • In-Person Hands-On Training Sessions: 4 days (Hands-on training for identified areas of weakness to achieve finesse)

attributes.title: facial cosmetics
attributes.shortDescription:
• Complete Hands-On
  • Business Mentorship
  • Trainer Mentorship
  • Practice Set-Up
  • Study Material
  • Product & Dealer Guide
attributes.courseAbout:
An International Education UK Board Certified, 10 days comprehensive hybrid program conceptualized for aestheticians to incorporate facial cosmetology into their day-to-day practice. The course is designed and customized keeping in mind the practical and patient-based approach towards cosmetology.

 

Apart from giving you the individual attention needed to develop the skills, the small group & extensive hands-on format empowers the trainees to practice cosmetology independently & broaden their repertoire of offered services.

 

The course begins with complete diagnosis and treatment planning, followed by extensive knowledge & training in the entire gamut of Facial Cosmetology. You will then be trained on real-time patients & learn to formulate your own treatment plans and perform hands-on for all procedures on those patients.

 

During the course, you will find an extensive display of the latest products & equipment of the top brands complete with product guides and dealer guides that are up-to-date with market trends, economically viable, and safe for the patients.

 

Throughout the program, you will be getting one-on-one Business mentoring sessions in all aspects of the practice ensuring a stellar journey in your cosmetology practice. And we will be part of your journey with our mentorship support and security.

roadmap.description:

  • 1 Online Live Interactive Lecture Session (webinar)
  • Lectures Series Part 1 (3 Pre-recorded Lectures), covers various aspects of Clinical Cosmetology, to help you understand the intricacies before coming for Hands-On modules.

attributes.title: hair restoration
attributes.shortDescription:
• Complete Hands-On
  • Business Mentorship
  • Trainer Mentorship
  • Practice Set-Up
  • Study Material
  • Product & Dealer Guide
attributes.courseAbout:
An International Education UK Board Certified, 6 days comprehensive hybrid program conceptualized for doctors and surgeons to incorporate the finess of hair restoration into their day-to-day practice. The course is designed and customized keeping in mind the practical and patient-based approach towards trichology.

 

Apart from giving you the individual attention needed to develop the skills, the small group & extensive Hands-on format empowers the trainees to practice hair transplantation independently & broaden their repertoire of offered services.

 

The course begins with extensive hands-on training, on real-time patients for both surgical and non-surgical aspects of hair restoration. This will help you formulate your own treatment plans and you will be able to perform the procedures on your patients with confidence.

 

Throughout the program, you will be getting one-on-one Business mentoring sessions in all aspects of the practice ensuring a stellar journey in your cosmetology practice. And we will be part of your journey with our mentorship support and security.
